description:
Marmiton

Marmiton your preferred cookbook, now available on the HP TouchPad

The reference cookbook with over 50,000 recipes at your disposal free of charge. Your culinary companion guide in the kitchen to realize all your menus with practical video and picture advise as well as feedback from other users.

Marmiton offers you an integrated application, practical and simple to organize a dinner with your friends; book a date, choose your friends to invite via facebook, propose a menu, share comments, notes, pictures and videos of your evening, return an invitation.

Organizing a dinner has never been easier thanks to Marmiton.

- At-a-glance
more than 50,000 recipes, and every day new recipes are added by the users for the users, comments, videos and pictures

- Dinner with friends
A facebook application to invite your friends for dinner with choice of date, invitees, menu, everything is managed for you. After having spent a nice dinner, friends can share their pictures, comments, videos and return an invitation.

- Selection of recipes of the day
Find every day new recipes of the day and  saison, selected and visualized by the marmitonautes.

- Search Engine
You can search by ingredient or name, find or re-find instantly the recipes you are looking for, all every simple.

- Your personal recipe Journal
You have created your own personal recipes Journal? Find them easily with a couple of taps on your HP TouchPad.

- Simplifying your shopping list
Recover your shopping list on Marmiton, or complete it directly from your HP TouchPad.
